actions.text: By unanimous consent, the Heck (WA) amendment was withdrawn.
Amendment (A053) offered by Mr. Heck (WA) to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A053) offered by Mr. Heck (WA) to the Rules amendment (A001).

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

purpose: An amendment No. 11 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to require the Department of Transportation to develop a set of best practices for the installation and maintenance of green stormwater infrastructure, and assist any state requesting help to develop a stormwater management plan by providing guidance based on those best practices.
